title: Requires insurers to provide victims of domestic violence with the option of providing alternative contact information
summary: Requires insurers to provide an insurer or subscriber who is a victim of domestic violence, upon request of such insurer or subscriber, with the option to designate alternative contact information for the purpose of receiving specific claim information or for specific billing purposes.
